br.com.caelum.vraptor.vraptor2
Interface ComponentInfoProvider

All Known Implementing Classes:
DefaultComponentInfoProvider
public interface ComponentInfoProvider

Provides information related to vraptor 2 for the request.

Author:
Guilherme Silveira

Method Summary
 Outjecter getOutjecter()
          Returns the specific outjecter for this ajax or non-ajax request.
Ajax based requests uses the JsonOutjecter while non ajax based uses the DefaulOutjecter.
 boolean isAjax()
          Whether this is an ajax request.
 boolean shouldShowView(ResourceMethod method)
          Whether a show view should be shown for this request.

getOutjecter

Outjecter getOutjecter()
Returns the specific outjecter for this ajax or non-ajax request.
Ajax based requests uses the JsonOutjecter while non ajax based uses the DefaulOutjecter.
